description:
Are you an entrepreneur or freelancer who wants to grow your sales so you can continue doing what you love, but you don't have the typical sales persona, and you just don't know how to?

  • Does selling make you squeamish?
  • Want to get paid your worth but don't know how?
  • Need to grow your sales so you don't have to dust off your CV and work for someone else?

If these sound like you, and you want to learn how to sell without being salesy, then you've come to the right place.

In just under two hours of content, with 28 videos + downloads with practical exercises, you will learn how to:

  • Avoid killing sales with typical novice mistakes
  • Learn how to effectively communicate your value
  • How to steer conversations towards a sale
  • How to close
  • What to say when a prospect says no
title: Easy Selling for Entrepreneurs and Freelancers
